overview: You remember your first time, don't you? How about the first time you get to witness a gorgeous, sexy young woman being penetrated by a hot, hung, and passionate black man! For sizzling interracial stories include A Valentine's day gift where Demi Lopez seduces the unsuspecting Jax Slayher, the next door neighbor for whom she used to babysit. Kiley Jay shares a dinner with her husband and his work associate, Moe "The Monster" Johnson. She has some very "Dark Dreams" when she pays him a midnight visit and learns first hand why they call him "The Monster". Karly Baker acts out her erotic dream with her therapist, Jon Jon. And Ziggy Star finally nails her schoolmate, Ricky Johson, whom she's been dreaming about for years. Come over to the Dark side to Dark X's First Time!
title: Her 1st Interracial 3
